changelog.change: Autosplitter: Added support for currently available "Patch 2 Hotfix 1" releases.
Autosplitter: Added support for currently available "Patch 2" releases.
Autosplitter: Corrected bug with displaying the correct version name for GOG v1.0, the initial release on GOG.
General: Fixed possible crash/hang from memory scanning and retry logic.
TR6R: Corrected bug in detecting New Game+ correctly (for Achievements% support).
TR5: Corrected bug in Secrets address scan; now correctly points to savegame value instead of level value.
Autosplitter: Updated several signatures to work with Patch 1 changes.
General: Corrected version detection bug to now show the unknown game's MD5 hash.
General: Improved scan retry logic and made the timer non-blocking to LiveSplit process.
Autosplitter: Updated TR4 Pickups signature to work with Patch 1 changes.
Pickups and Secrets splits: Improved consistency.
Autosplitter: Added additional retries with Settings menu messages when unsuccessfully scanning launching game.
TR4R: Improved Split consistency.
TR4R: Fixed IL / Area% logic which may also resolve TTE inconsistencies.
Settings menu: fixed bug where controls were not disabling correctly while a game was found.
Settings menu: forced LiveSplit to render setting in bigger window, which should remove scroll bars and improve UX.
Fixed TR6 false start when loading after launch.
Improved TR4 and TR5 LRT.
Fixed TR4 and TTE double-split prevention for last level. Fixed edge case undesired Reset when setting was not enabled.
Hotfix for TTE inconsistent splits; Office cutscene should now always be skipped and playable level should always split at the end.
Hotfix for TR5R LRT breaking during Deepsea Dive and Security Breach.
Initial release. FG, IL / Area%, and Deathrun support with automatic Start, Split, and optional Reset. Supports LiveSplit's Undo Split.
